description:
The child strategist with both wisdom and courage who carries the name of the ancient swordsman and general and is the leader of the Toyotomi Faction with http://anidb.net/ch19200 [Gotou Matabei], the beautiful girl who uses spears.
In battle, swings the huge iron-ribbed fans for both attack and defense.
Loli, tsundere, tsurupeta, sukumizu, etc. In a way, a thirteen year old middle school student equipped with the strongest weapons without regrets.
name: Sanada Yukimura
